about_the_game:
Explore the continuation of the Inkbound’s story in The Starship of Terrors Support Pack DLC. This cosmetics pack contains exclusive items that will surely make you stand out from your party members. The DLC supports the future development of Inkbound, while also getting your hands on exclusive cosmetic upgrades.

The DLC Contains:

7 Legendary Aspect Cosmetic Sets

  • Magma Miner - Seafloor Smelter's Set
  • Mosscloak - Skulltide Scuba Set
  • Clairvoyant - Triocular Trance Set
  • Weaver - Groove-Thread Set
  • Obelisk - Ocean Guardian Set
  • Star Captain - Galactic Voyager Set
  • Star Captain - Eyes of the Cosmos Set

Additional Cosmetics

  • 14 Helmets
  • 13 Weapons
  • 11 Emotes and Dances
  • 4 Head Effects
  • 4 Trail Effects
  • 1 Back Effect
  • 1 Kwill
  • 1 Supporter UI Nameplate

The DLC content will be added to your cosmetic inventory after purchasing and entering the Atheneum or a run while online.

Note: If you bought The Starship of Terrors Pass in-game during Early Access before October 27, 2023 then you already own this content.

By buying this DLC, you are supporting us and the development of future updates and content. From everyone at Shiny Shoe, thank you!

The DLC supports the future development of Inkbound, while also getting your hands on exclusive cosmetic upgrades.

The DLC content will be added to your cosmetic inventory after purchasing and entering the Atheneum or a run while online.

Note: If you bought The Starship of Terrors Pass in-game during Early Access before October 27, 2023 then you already own this content.

By buying this DLC, you are supporting us and the development of future updates and content. From everyone at Shiny Shoe, thank you!

short_description: The Starship of Terrors Supporter Pack rewards your support with a wide variety of exclusive cosmetic items to customize your look. It includes armor sets, weapons, helmets, and a bundle of space-themed visual effects to enhance your journey through the world of Inkbound.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
